short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group your tabs by website domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically groups tabs based on their website domain. Stay focused, reduce clutter, and improve productivity.

Press on the extension icon to toggle the extension on and off.
Doesn't group single tabs or pinned tabs.

Feel free to send any suggestions or comments to my email.

V 0.1.0:
Major bug fixes:
- State is now stored locally leading to consistent on/off states
- Fixed edge cases including refreshing, multiple windows, opening in new tab, domains with different formats, etc.
V 0.0.4:
- Renamed extension
- Fixed grouping error
V 0.0.3:
- Removed grouping of pinned tabs
- Shortened group names
V 0.0.2:
- Removed grouping of single tabs
- Fixed on/off state bug
